title: I’m Cohabiting With the Most Beautiful Girl in School, but She’s Too Much of a Yandere! - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cohabitation   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Male Protagonist   Yandere
author: 赤月ヤモリ
description:
Enomoto Iruka is an ordinary first-year high school student.
For some reason, he is living together with Hamamiya Kaya, a beautiful girl who is famous at school.
It's the perfect situation for a high school boy, but Kaya is a complete and total yandere.......
>
